name: project-multilevel-index
description: 分形多级索引系统 - 受《哥德尔、埃舍尔、巴赫》启发的自指文档系统。自动维护 PROJECT_INDEX、FOLDER_INDEX 和文件头注释，实现代码与文档的完美同步。
longDescription: A fractal self-referential documentation system for Claude Code. Automatically maintains three-level indices (PROJECT_INDEX.md, FOLDER_INDEX.md, file headers) with dependency analysis, Mermaid graphs, and auto-update hooks. Supports 10 programming languages with full i18n (zh-CN/en-US).
